name: AnnounceME
author: Bernhard BÃ¼cherl

sections.description: AnnounceME is a simple plugin, coded to help you publishing important Announcements, which can be read by every user of your Blog. AnnounceME uses the same design as WordPress in backend, to make it easier to handle with it.
sections.installation:
1.

Upload the announceme folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2.

Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

3.

Go to the AnnounceME menupoint and start announcing
sections.changelog:
0.3.3

  • Bug fix: jQuery: collision with other versions
  • Bug fix: animation cuts body on closing an announcement
  • Bug fix: body-backgroundimage animation
  • Bug fix: removed “console.log” because of an conflict with Internet Explorer
  • Added: rename “Don’t show this again”-messages

0.3.2

  • Bug fix: Internet Explorer Bugs
  • Trying to fix Bug: Adminpanel stucks at some users

0.3.1

  • Bug fix: invalid Header error

0.3

  • Added: “Don’t show this again” Buttons to the Announcements
  • Added: Design can now be changed freely
  • Added: Multi-Announcement Support
  • released (2011-05-03)

0.2.5

  • Added: Animations

0.2

  • Designed & coded backendpage

0.1

  • Designed & coded fontend
  • created function to install the Database table
